wikipedia_page.main: Gordon "Bumper" Clifford Taylor (24 October 1915 – 27 June 2009) was a Royal Navy chaplain, Anglican priest, author and clergyman, who served as a priest for more than fifty years.

response: *Gordon Taylor, 93, British Anglican priest and Royal Navy chaplain.
* Gordon Taylor (politician) (1910–2003), Canadian politician, businessman and teacher
* Gordon Taylor (Royal Navy chaplain) (1915–2009), Royal Navy chaplain, Anglican priest, author and clergyman
* Gordon Taylor (aviator) (1896-1966), Australian aviator and author
